description: Biocalcium is a multiple-action toothpaste with bioactive calcium obtained from eggshell and hydroxyapatite, an essential component in the composition of dental enamel. The high content of these ingredients makes it possible to strengthen and remineralise dental enamel and reduce hypersensitivity.
title: SPLAT Biocalcium Toothpaste

description: Specially selected abrasives safely and effectively remove plaque, clean and polish tooth enamel. Active ingredients: Hydroxyapatite remineralizes enamel, restores microscopic damage of dentin, increases adhesion and cleaves plaque.
title: PRESIDENT PROFI White toothpaste

description: Colgate Total was created to prevent and reduce tooth decay, gingivitis, plaque, above gum line and bad breath.
title: Colgate Total

description: Aquafresh® Ultimate White toothpaste gently polishes your teeth, lifts away stains and helps to prevent new stains appearing.
title: Aquafresh® Ultimate White

description: The Classic Toothpaste Blend-a-med is a proven protection against decay and periodontal disease. It offers the proven Blend-a-med protection system with a traditional fresh taste.
title: Blend-a-med Complete Plus

description: Elmex Decays Prevention Toothpaste 2 x 75ml contains amin fluoride Olafluor (1250 ppm) which fixes on the enamel, stimulates its remineralisation and makes it more resistant to the acid bacterial attacks of the dental plaque. Used daily, it supports the prevention of the decay.
title: Elmex Decays Prevention

description: Its safe formula if swallowed, and its favored taste of sweet porridge make this toothpaste a vital tool for the care of your baby!
title: Toothpaste R.O.C.S.® baby mild care with camomile
